import User from './User'
import Categorie from './Categorie'
import Product from './Product'
import Variedad from './Variedad'
import Slider from './Slider'
import Cupone from './Cupone'
import Discount from './Discount'
export default {
    User,
    Categorie,
    Product,
    Variedad,
    Slider,
    Cupone,
    Discount,
}

import Product from './Product'
